attributes.action: The house to debate whether the will of the people has changed regarding brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
There are thousands of polls available, here are a couple:
https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/brexit-deal-theresa-may-uk-vote-economy-mps-remain-a8673926.html
Https://www.telegraph.co.uk/politics/2018/12/12/polls-show-voters-hardening-against-brexit-compromise/
attributes.background: There is much debate around whether the will of the people might have changed in the two years since the vote. I'm asking the house to tackle this question head on.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We aren't sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take a result of this debate.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like to happen.
